title: Claimed by the Orc
description: Everyone fears the Orcs that live beyond the edge of our kingdom. They are known as fierce and brutal warriors that show no mercy to their enemies.When I’m fleeing through the woods for my life, I’m caught by their leader. The moment our eyes meet, Tharos claims I am his Fated One—his A’shkyra.Humans and Orcs have been enemies for hundreds of years, but his people believe that a Fated bond cannot be undone.Despite my protests, Tharos says that I am his. Now I find myself wondering: What does it mean to be Claimed by an Orc?**Release date will be pushed forward when book ready**
author: Jessica Grayson
